entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the Potions master who is watching the Quidditch game from his broomstick. He sees something scarlet shoot past him and misses it by inches.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is playing Quidditch on his broomstick. He catches the Snitch in his hand and wins the game.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts who is excited about Harry's win. She is dancing up and down on her seat and hugging Parvati Patil in the row in front.

entities.name: parvati patil
entities.description: Parvati Patil is a student at Hogwarts who is being hugged by Hermione in celebration of Harry's win.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts who congratulates Harry on his win. He says 'Well done' to Harry quietly so that only he can hear it.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is a house at Hogwarts that is in the lead after Harry's win.

relationships.description: Snape misses something scarlet shoot past him, which is caught by Harry.
Hermione hugs Parvati Patil in celebration of Harry's win.
Dumbledore congratulates Harry on his win.
